sentences.en: ...a fine building, with a neat little porch and ornamental tiles on the roof
sentences.cn: ...一幢精致建筑，有个整洁的小门廊，屋顶上盖着装饰瓦。

sentences.en: ...a fine building, with a neat little porch and ornamental tiles on the roof.
sentences.cn: …一幢精致建筑，有个整洁的小门廊，屋顶上盖着装饰瓦。

sentences.en: A layer of coarse gravel is often placed around the drain tile.
sentences.cn: 常常在排水瓦管周围铺一层粗石砾.

sentences.en: bathroom tiles
sentences.cn: 浴室瓷砖

sentences.en: Describes how to tile an image in a shape.
sentences.cn: 描述如何在形状中平铺图像.

sentences.en: Floors are either hardwood or slate tile.
sentences.cn: 地面铺着硬木地板或石板瓷砖。

sentences.en: He wants to tile the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 他想在浴室里铺瓷砖。

sentences.en: His profession is an actor, stage name calls Kathy · tile inside.
sentences.cn: 他的职业是演员, 艺名叫凯西·瓦内.

sentences.en: I pointed to a number of scratches in the tile floor.
sentences.cn: 我指向地板砖上的一道道划痕。

sentences.en: it won't be the first time he's spent &B{a night on the tiles}.
sentences.cn: 这不会是他第一次过花天酒地的夜生活。

sentences.en: Make sure the tile is flush with the surrounding tiles.
sentences.cn: 要保证每块瓷砖都和它周围的瓷砖在同一平面上。

sentences.en: Normally, the brain does not interpret tile phosphene patterns as identifiable objects.
sentences.cn: 正常情况下, 脑不能把磷苯图像转化成可识别的物像.

sentences.en: Stick the pieces on with tile cement.
sentences.cn: 用瓷砖胶把它们一块块贴上去。

sentences.en: The ancient Egyptians could make glass, tile, turpentine, soap and dyes.
sentences.cn: 古埃及人制造了玻璃 、 瓷砖 、 松脂 、 肥皂和染料.

sentences.en: The bathroom is faced with tile.
sentences.cn: 浴室铺着瓷砖.

sentences.en: The cabins had linoleum tile floors.
sentences.cn: 船舱地上铺着油毡。

sentences.en: The floor was marble tile, and the columns alabaster.
sentences.cn: 地板是由大理石铺成的, 柱子则是雪花石膏打造而成.

sentences.en: The reconciled reptiles rest on a fragile tile.
sentences.cn: 和解的爬行动物歇在易碎的瓷砖上。

sentences.en: The'll pa me half cent per tile in cash.
sentences.cn: 每张半分,每天给现钱.

sentences.en: Vinyl can be laid in sheet or tile form.
sentences.cn: 塑料地板分为卷材和块材两种。

words.tran_cn: 砖瓦匠；秘密集会的看守人（等于tyler）
铺瓦于；铺以瓷砖（tile的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 瓷砖（有釉或无釉的）
(非正式，主英)（夜生活）纵情欢乐，花天酒地
墙面贴砖，壁面砖；贴面砖，瓷面砖

trans.tran_cn: 瓦片，瓷砖，空心砖，麻将牌
trans.tran_en: a flat square piece of baked clay or other material, used for covering walls, floors etc
to cover a roof, floor etc with tiles
to cover a roof, floor etc with tiles
